functs.OnUpdate: if (Input.getKey(65)){this.transform.Position.x -= 3;}if (Input.getKey(87)){this.transform.Position.y -= 3;}if (Input.getKey(83)){this.transform.Position.y += 3;}if (Input.getKey(68)){this.transform.Position.x += 3;} if (Input.getKeyDown(74)) {var v = GameObjectFactory("bullet.json"); v.transform.Position.x = this.transform.Position.x; v.transform.Position.y = this.transform.Position.y;}
